item.description:

I dont help noob leechers who can’t code.

But if you really want help, dont be lazy and read your commands.

Hint: Read admin commands, that helps you.

item.title: Need help with "item" on matrix. Trying to make it to admin+ can spawn
item.dc:creator: @jordan6203 jordan6203
item.description:
@jordan6203 wrote:

Hey everyone. So basically i’m using the Matrix Source to try out some coding on 700+ Sources. The “item” command is a little different compared to other 700+ servers Ex: Zenith, NSR3 Etc. The item command is:

case “item” :
if (cmd.length < 2) [player.getpackets().sendGameMessage(
"Use ::item id (optional.amount) ");
return true;
}

Could someone help me edit the code to where only admin+ could spawn? and also where only i could spawn? I’d appreciate it. Thanks!

Jordan6203

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with "item" on matrix. Trying to make it to admin+ can spawn
